system.description: Following Tau doctrine, the character provides covering fire to prevent enemies from engaging their allies in melee.
system.benefit: Any time an enemy makes a charge Action to engage in melee with an Allied Tau within 20 metres, the character can spend their reaction to make a standard ranged attack with -20 to the ballistic test to attack the enemy. This attack resolves prior to the target completing their charge action.

rollConfig.description: Reaction ranged attack against charging enemies

specialAbilities.name: Overwatch
specialAbilities.description: As a Reaction, when an enemy charges an allied Tau within 20m, make a ranged attack at -20 BS before they complete the charge.
